summary: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.
cast: Jet Li|Jason Statham|John Lone|Devon Aoki|Luis Guzmán|Saul Rubinek|Ryo Ishibashi|Sung Kang|Mathew St. Patrick|Nadine Velazquez|Andrea Roth|Mark Cheng|Kane Kosugi|Kennedy Montano|Terry Chen|Steph Song|Annika Foo|Nicholas Elia|Kenneth Choi|Eric Keenleyside|Paul Jarrett|Johnson Phan|Jung-Yul Kim|Hiro Kanagawa|Wilken Yam|Aaron Au|Mark Louie|Jennifer Chung|Lucy Lu|Randy Lee|Derek Lowe|John Novak|Don Lew|Warren Takeuchi|Nels Lennarson|Peter Shinkoda|Meghan Flather|Thi Tran|Mitchell A. Lee Yuen|Brian Ho|Larry Lam|Nadia Farès|Aaron Pearl|Tim Perez|Allan Lysell|Shawn Stewart|Dario Delacio|Brett Chan|Takashi Kanamori|Paulina Bui|Angela Fong|Stephanie Poon|Bruce Bellocchi|Lauro David Chartrand-DelValle|Ildiko Ferenczi|John Dylan Louie|Johnpaul Williams|Li Xing
title: El asesino (War)
